ingredients: 1  seedless watermelon, 2 cups strawberries, hulled and sliced, 1  cantaloupe - seeded, peeled, and sliced (Optional), 1  fresh pineapple - peeled, cored, and sliced (Optional)
nutrition: Total Fat 1g 2%, Saturated Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 18mg 1%, Total Carbohydrate 59g 21%, Dietary Fiber 4g 16%, Total Sugars 48g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 120mg 602%, Calcium 59mg 5%, Iron 2mg 10%, Potassium 934mg 20%
